mapper.select: select * from board where bd_type = #{bd_type} and bd_mb_num = #{bd_mb_num} and bd_title = #{bd_title} and bd_content = #{bd_content}
mapper.insert: insert into board(bd_type, bd_mb_num, bd_title, bd_content) values(#{bd_type}, #{bd_mb_num}, #{bd_title}, #{bd_content})
insert into qna(qn_bd_num, qn_gs_num, qn_state) values(#{qn_bd_num}, #{qn_gs_num}, #{qn_state})
insert into attachment(at_bd_num, at_ori_name, at_name) values(#{at_bd_num}, #{at_ori_name}, #{at_name})
